text: Original Tommy's is a fast food hamburger restaurant chain in the Los Angeles metropolitan area. It is best known for its hamburgers and chili burgers. It was on May 15, 1946, by Tom Koulax, the son of Greek immigrants, on the northeast corner of Beverly and Rampart boulevards west of downtown Los Angeles. Category:American fast food restaurants Category:1946 establishments in the United States
title: Original Tommy's
